channel.title: maven on Devflection
channel.description: Recent content in maven on Devflection

item.title: Apache Maven Part 2 - Build lifecycle and Apache Maven Plugins
item.author: matija@devflection.com (Matija Heri훾ko)
item.description: This multi-post series is looking at Apache Maven. In the second part, we will take a closer look at the build lifecycle and the workers in Maven - Maven Plugins. This post is part of a series about Apache Maven. You can read part one - an introduction to Maven here. Introduction As mentioned in the first post, the idea of Maven was to solve the issue of different build results on different machines.

item.title: Apache Maven Part 1 - Introduction and basics
item.author: matija@devflection.com (Matija Heri훾ko)
item.description: This multi-post series will be looking at Apache Maven. In this first part, we will provide a high-level overview, explain some of the basics and show an example of a simple Maven managed project.
